texts: On examination her abdomen was grossly distended , diffusely tender and hyper-resonant . This is a case of a 57-year-old gentleman with a history of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) who presented with diarrhoea of more than 4 weeks in length . The patient was later found to have a large endotracheal mass .

He made a full recovery after supportive treatment . A review of the literature was also performed to summarise the potential clinical presentations , distinctive imaging findings and management options available for this rare condition .
